paper_abstract: Let and be two odd primes with and is even. A new construction of -ary sequences of period with low periodic autocorrelation is presented in this paper based on interleaving the -ary power residue sequence of period according to the quadratic residue with respect to . This construction can generate the well-known twin-prime sequence and generalized cyclotomy sequence of order two if . For , a new class of quaternary sequences of period with maximal nontrivial autocorrelation value being either or is obtained. This achieves the best known results for such kind of quaternary sequences.
paper_title: New M-ary sequences with low autocorrelation from interleaved technique
